title: Profissional Back End .Net/Python - SR
description:
Código da vaga: 47141


Sobre a BRQ Digital


Há 32 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior.


Nossos 2.500 mil funcionários atuam no modelo de trabalho Anywhere Office e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.


BRQ WAY


No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia!


É isso que queremos, com nosso Programa de Diversidade e Inclusão trabalhamos com dois objetivos: equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.


Vamos transformar juntos! Vem ser fera com a gente.


  • Ei Profissional Back End .Net/Python - SR, chegou o momento de encarar um novo desafio em sua carreira! Venha ser um #ferabrq


- O que procuramos?


Buscamos um #fera com espírito empreendedor e que sabe que é o verdadeiro protagonista do seu sucesso! Queremos em nosso time pessoas motivadas por desafios, constante evolução e, claro, que são apaixonadas por tecnologia e transformação!


- O que você deve ter?


Habilidades Principais:

  • Linguagens: .NET Core, Python
  • Serviços AWS: ECS, API Gateway, Lambda, Terraform/CloudFormation, Glue, Step Functions, DynamoDB, Athena, SQS, SNS
  • Integração de Dados: Kafka, Data Mesh


- O que temos pra te oferecer?


Mais do que um plano de carreira !


A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares:


Carreira técnica: Você pode seguir a trilha de crescimento técnico, se o seu objetivo for se desenvolver cada vez mais em diferentes tecnologias. Oferecemos diversos treinamentos!


Carreira de Liderança: Você pode seguir a trilha e se tornar um líder, desenvolver pessoas, auxiliar na evolução profissional e pessoal e estimular o crescimento para o surgimento de novos talentos.


Experiência internacional: Estamos crescendo cada vez mais fora do Brasil e você tem possibilidade de atuar em projetos para outros países, ou diretamente nos países onde a BRQ tem sede.


Empreendedorismo: De funcionário para sócio! Temos o Innovation Hub, a Corporate Venture que investe em ideias de profissionais que tenham sinergia com nosso negócio.


- E os benefícios?


Plano de Saúde; Plano Odontológico; Seguro de Vida; Vale Refeição; Vale Alimentação; Horário Flexível; Atuação híbrida; Gympass, Telemedicina, Telenutrição, Canal de suporte emocional 24h e muito mais!


- Como é trabalhar na BRQ?


Temos um clima descontraído, diversos programas e eventos internos. Adoramos comemorar! E fazemos isso muito bem! Veja aqui no Youtube: youtube.com/brqdigitalsolutions


Curtiu? Então inscreva-se e venha para o melhor da Transformação Digital com a gente!

title: Profissional Back End .Net/Python - SR
description:
Código da vaga: 47141


Sobre a BRQ Digital


Há 32 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior.


Nossos 2.500 mil funcionários atuam no modelo de trabalho Anywhere Office e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.


BRQ WAY


No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia!


É isso que queremos, com nosso Programa de Diversidade e Inclusão trabalhamos com dois objetivos: equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.


Vamos transformar juntos! Vem ser fera com a gente.


  • Ei Profissional Back End .Net/Python - SR, chegou o momento de encarar um novo desafio em sua carreira! Venha ser um #ferabrq


- O que procuramos?


Buscamos um #fera com espírito empreendedor e que sabe que é o verdadeiro protagonista do seu sucesso! Queremos em nosso time pessoas motivadas por desafios, constante evolução e, claro, que são apaixonadas por tecnologia e transformação!


- O que você deve ter?


Habilidades Principais:

  • Linguagens: .NET Core, Python
  • Serviços AWS: ECS, API Gateway, Lambda, Terraform/CloudFormation, Glue, Step Functions, DynamoDB, Athena, SQS, SNS
  • Integração de Dados: Kafka, Data Mesh


- O que temos pra te oferecer?


Mais do que um plano de carreira !


A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares:


Carreira técnica: Você pode seguir a trilha de crescimento técnico, se o seu objetivo for se desenvolver cada vez mais em diferentes tecnologias. Oferecemos diversos treinamentos!


Carreira de Liderança: Você pode seguir a trilha e se tornar um líder, desenvolver pessoas, auxiliar na evolução profissional e pessoal e estimular o crescimento para o surgimento de novos talentos.


Experiência internacional: Estamos crescendo cada vez mais fora do Brasil e você tem possibilidade de atuar em projetos para outros países, ou diretamente nos países onde a BRQ tem sede.


Empreendedorismo: De funcionário para sócio! Temos o Innovation Hub, a Corporate Venture que investe em ideias de profissionais que tenham sinergia com nosso negócio.


- E os benefícios?


Plano de Saúde; Plano Odontológico; Seguro de Vida; Vale Refeição; Vale Alimentação; Horário Flexível; Atuação híbrida; Gympass, Telemedicina, Telenutrição, Canal de suporte emocional 24h e muito mais!

title: Engineering Manager -  Remote
description:
Recognized as the leading software development company in the Americas, our client offers 100% remote modality and an excellent work environment in which employees can thrive, work in multicultural teams, with flexible schedules and endless growth opportunities.


About the Role:

We are looking for an Engineering Manager to lead our Engineering Team and help spearhead our growth.


As an Engineering Manager, you will play a critical and active role in the day-to-day operations. This is an excellent opportunity to be one of the key members of our Engineering team and position yourself for unique career growth opportunities.


What You’ll Do:

- Be in charge of the Human Capital for the Project: hiring, retaining, and firing. Compensation plans, motivation, etc.

- Help in the definition and monitor metrics and KPIs for the teams.

- Make sure that team coordination and the development process are executed correctly.

- Lead all the Scrum ceremonies and its compliance.

- Encourage a collaborative engineering culture according to the company values.


You Must Have:

- 10+ Experience in Software Development related roles in a relevant company.

- 5+ Experience as a Project Manager or similar.

- Strong Project Management skills.

- Excellent communication skills.

- Advanced English Level.


Benefits:

- 100% remote work.

- Flexible hours - make your own schedule!

- Diverse and multicultural work environment.

- Paid parental leave, vacation & holidays.

- Hardware setup for you to work from home.

- Excellent compensation — well above the market average.

- Extensive opportunities for growth and professional development thanks to our mentoring system.


Enjoy the opportunity to have a dynamic lifestyle, better health, and wellness. Find renewed passion in your job, improve your productivity, and benefit from attractive growth opportunities for your career.


If you are interested in being part of a team composed of the best professionals and working 100% goal-oriented in an innovative environment, but with the structure and resources of a multinational market leader, do not hesitate to apply!

title: Pessoa Desenvolvedora - CRM Dynamics 365/Power Platform
description:
Vem ser TeamBest! Estamos contratando: Pessoa Desenvolvedora CRM Dynamics/Power Platform

A Best.Projects Consultoria e Gestão é especialista na implementação de soluções tecnológicas com foco na plataforma Microsoft. Atuamos com excelência no setor público, entregando projetos que transformam realidades, impulsionam a inovação e geram resultados concretos para nossos clientes.

Se você é apaixonado(a) por tecnologia, curte um bom desafio e quer crescer em um ambiente colaborativo, o Teambest quer te conhecer!


O que você vai fazer por aqui:

  • Atuar em projetos com desenvolvimento em CRM Dynamics e Power Platform;
  • Criar plugins, WebServices (SOAP/REST), client scripts, páginas web, além de realizar testes unitários e integrados;
  • Apoiar em fases de operação assistida e suporte pós-produção.


Conhecimentos que você precisa ter:

  • Experiência prática com Microsoft Dynamics CRM/Dynamics 365;
  • Conhecimento em C#, .NET, JavaScript e TypeScript;
  • Vivência com Power Platform (Power Automate, Power Apps);
  • Capacidade de trabalhar com Azure Functions, Logic Apps e Web APIs;
  • Experiência com SQL Server e FetchXML;
  • Conhecimento em integrações via Web Services (REST/SOAP);
  • Boa compreensão de modelagem de dados e arquitetura de sistemas.

O que vai te destacar:

  • Certificação Microsoft em Dynamics 365 ou Power Platform;
  • Experiência com Azure DevOps e pipelines CI/CD;
  • Conhecimento em metodologias ágeis como Scrum ou Kanban.


Trabalho híbrido – 2x por semana no nosso escritório localizado na Vila Mariana, São Paulo/SP.

title: React Developer - Remote
description:
At INDI, we're passionate about empowering individuals and businesses worldwide. Our cutting-edge recruiters connect leading companies with top talent, fostering a dynamic environment where innovation thrives. Join us in shaping the future of work.


About the Role:

Step into the world of frontend excellence as our React Developer, where you'll craft stunning user interfaces and functionality for innovative web applications. This isn't just about coding - it's about creating immersive digital experiences that delight users while collaborating with elite professionals across various cutting-edge industries.


What will I do?

Design and implement responsive user interfaces using React.js.

Develop reusable components and libraries for future use.

Transform UI/UX designs into high-quality, functional code.

Optimize application performance and responsiveness.

Collaborate with backend developers to integrate frontend with API services.

Participate in code reviews and implement best practices.

Stay at the forefront of emerging trends and technologies in frontend development.

Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.


Required skills and qualifications:

3+ years of experience with React.js and JavaScript/TypeScript.

Strong understanding of frontend fundamentals (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).

Experience with state management libraries (Redux, Context API, MobX).

Knowledge of modern frontend build tools and workflows.

Familiarity with RESTful APIs and integration patterns.

Experience with responsive design and cross-browser compatibility.

Understanding of UI/UX design principles.

Ability to write clean, efficient, and maintainable code.

Advanced English proficiency.


Benefits:

• Flexibility: Choose where and how you work for enhanced creativity and innovation.

• Tailored Compensation: Personalize your earnings to suit your financial goals.

• Tech-Driven Tools: Access cutting-edge resources for seamless collaboration and productivity.

• Autonomous Workflow: Take control of your schedule to achieve work-life balance.

• Well-being: Enjoy generous leave policies for rest and rejuvenation.

• Diversity & Inclusion: Thrive in a diverse and inclusive environment.

• Collaboration: Engage with industry leaders for collective growth.

• Development: Access mentorship and growth opportunities for continuous advancement.


If you are interested in being part of a team composed of the best professionals and working 100% goal-oriented in an innovative environment, but with the structure and resources of a multinational market leader, do not hesitate to apply!

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer (.Net + React)
description:
O que buscamos:

Profissional com nível de inglês avançado/fluente que atue com Engenharia Fullstack (.Net + React) em um projeto internacional.


Responsabilidades:

  • Engajar-se e aprender sobre regras de negócios complexas relacionadas a áreas financeiras como: Mercados de Capitais, Private Equity e Gestão de Ativos.
  • Projetar e desenvolver soluções de alta qualidade usando as diversas tecnologias da empresa mencionada (mas não se limitando a estas), garantindo a qualidade do código, escalabilidade, confiabilidade e segurança.
  • Colaborar com equipes para projetar e implementar novos recursos e aplicações, seguindo metodologias ágeis.
  • Desenvolver soluções nativas na nuvem usando AWS, Terraform, Docker e Nginx, garantindo escalabilidade, robustez e conformidade com recuperação de desastres.
  • Colaborar no desenvolvimento de novos recursos, melhorias e corrigir bugs existentes no sistema.
  • Ter vontade de identificar áreas de melhoria nos sistemas existentes e se sentir empoderado para propor e implementar soluções criativas, enquanto aconselha sobre as melhores práticas de desenvolvimento de software.
  • Interagir de forma constante e dinâmica com BAs, QAs e outros colegas para esclarecer os requisitos de negócios.
  • Ter habilidade para conduzir projetos desde a concepção até a conclusão, liderando o design técnico e revisões de código em direção aos melhores resultados.


Requisitos e Qualificações:

  • Inglês avançado/fluente;
  • .Net;
  • React e Material UI;
  • HTML, CSS, JavaScript;
  • Serviços AWS (ECS, S3, Lambda, SQS, DynamoDB, etc.);
  • DevOps & Automação (Terraform, Docker, Jenkins, GitHub Actions, CI/CD).


Descrição comportamental:

Procuramos uma pessoa que:

  • Goste de trabalhar em equipe e seja colaborativa em suas atribuições;
  • Tenha coragem para se desafiar e ir além, abraçando novas oportunidades de crescimento;
  • Transforme ideias em soluções criativas e busque qualidade em toda sua rotina;
  • Tenha habilidades de resolução de problemas ;
  • Possua habilidade e se sinta confortável para trabalhar de forma independente e gerenciar o próprio tempo ;
  • Tenha interesse em lidar com situações adversas e inovadoras no âmbito tecnológico.

#VamosVoarJuntos

#ProudToBeGFT

title: Finance Analyst - Remote
description:
Recognized as the leading software development company in the Americas, our client offers 100% remote modality and an excellent work environment where employees can thrive, and work in multicultural teams, with flexible schedules and endless growth opportunities.


About the Role:


We are seeking a Finance Analyst to join our team and help drive our growth. As a Finance Analyst, you will play a critical and active role in the day-to-day operations. This is an excellent opportunity to be one of the key members of our team and position yourself for unique career growth opportunities.

What You’ll Do:


- Perform research and gather documentation to compile comprehensive reports delivering operational reports, and transactional tasks.

- Work with banking/financial entities, international agencies, or government officials.

- Assist in vendor and client registration, purchasing, and accounts payable processes.

- Data processing: responsible for updating records in the company system.

- Assist in the department's programs, projects, and processes.

- Assist in the preparation of monthly financial reports.

- Assist in tracking due dates and compliance with US tax returns and other legal requirements.


Here’s what we are looking for:


- 3+ years of experience working in finance areas.

- Expertise with web-based tools.

- Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

- Interpersonal and presentation skills.

- Organized and detail-oriented.

- Proven organizational skills.

- Advanced English, both spoken and written (a must).


Benefits:


- 100% remote work.

- Flexible hours - make your own schedule!

- Diverse and multicultural work environment.

- Paid parental leave, vacation & holidays.

- Hardware setup for you to work from home.

- Excellent compensation — well above the market average.

- Extensive opportunities for growth and professional development thanks to our mentoring system.


Enjoy the opportunity to have a dynamic lifestyle, better health, and wellness. Find renewed passion in your job, improve your productivity, and benefit from attractive growth opportunities for your career.


If you are interested in being part of a team composed of the best professionals and working 100% goal-oriented in an innovative environment, but with the structure and resources of a multinational market leader, do not hesitate to apply!

title: Consultor Especialista LOW-CODE
description:
Sobre a Empresa


Há mais de 20 anos mercado, somos uma consultoria estratégica de Inovação e Transformação Digital. Nossa especialidade é impulsionar as demandas de nossos clientes, integrando processos, pessoas e tecnologia de alta performance.


Sobre o Cargo


ESPECIALISTA Low-code


Responsabilidades


  • Atuação como elo entre o negócio e a equipe técnica, alinhando os objetivos estratégicos da organização com a visão de produto;
  • Levantar requisitos com usuários e stakeholders.
  • Garantir que os requisitos sejam bem compreendidos, traduzindo necessidades em entregáveis claros;
  • Garantir a performance, escalabilidade e manutenção das soluções desenvolvidas.
  • Priorizar demandas, orientar feedbacks contínuos, ajustar prioridades e orientar nas decisões técnicas ao longo dos ciclos de sprint, garantindo foco no valor agregado.
  • Automatizar processos de negócios e fluxos de trabalho.


Habilidades Necessárias


  • Experiência com pelo menos uma plataforma de desenvolvimento low code (ex: Power Apps, OutSystems, Mendix, Appian etc.);
  • Atuação anterior como Desenvolvedor de Software;
  • Será um diferencial, conhecimento em Linguagens como Java, JavaScript, React;
  • Ter conhecimento em Gestão de Requisitos, Padrões de Projeto, Banco de Dados,
  • Metodologias Ágeis;
  • Desejável Certificações específicas em plataformas low-code.


CLT

Benefícios CLT:

title: Desenvolvedor(a) Backend Node Senior
description:
Olá, somos a SuperFrete :)


Estamos construindo a maior e mais amada rede de logística digital, quer fazer parte disso?

Somos uma startup que atua no segmento do varejo e logística, apoiando os pequenos e médios empreendedores a se tornarem mais competitivos no mercado e a alavancarem suas vendas.

Por isso, buscamos um Super Desenvolvedor(a) Backend Node Senior , dinâmico e experiente, que se identifique com o nosso propósito, que tenha muita energia para somar no time de Tecnologia e que queira crescer (muito!) com a gente.


Responsabilidades:

  • Irá ajudar a criar e implementar soluções para manter o sistema sempre prático e escalável;
  • Fazer code reviews com atenção e cuidado;
  • Desenvolver, manter e otimizar aplicações backend usando Node.js, TypeScript e JavaScript;
  • Colaborar com a equipe de desenvolvimento para projetar e implementar soluções escaláveis e de alto desempenho;
  • Integrar sistemas com serviços de nuvem (ex: Firebase, AWS) para garantir escalabilidade e confiabilidade;
  • Desenvolver e manter bancos de dados MongoDB, garantindo eficiência e segurança;
  • Apoiar iniciativas de DevOps, automatizando processos e implantando pipelines de CI/CD;
  • Colaborar com outros membros da equipe para garantir a consistência e a qualidade do código;
  • Responder prontamente às necessidades da equipe e do projeto, resolvendo problemas com princípios de programação sólidos.


Requisitos:

  • Sólida experiência em desenvolvimento backend com Node.js;
  • Conhecimento de TypeScript e JavaScript.
  • Experiência em integração com serviços de nuvem (Firebase, AWS, etc.).
  • Familiaridade com bancos de dados relacionais e não relacionais, como Postgres e Mongodb;
  • Saiba escrever testes;
  • Experiência em práticas de DevOps;
  • Compreensão profunda de arquitetura de software orientada a serviços e boas práticas de desenvolvimento;
  • Alguma experiência com desenho, construção e otimização de arquitetura serverless;
  • Experiência com Clean Code e/ou Clean Architecture;
  • Capacidade de trabalhar com problemas novos e difíceis e de contribuir para bibliotecas conforme necessário.


Será legal se você tiver:

  • Experiência com CI/CD com pipelines;
  • Conhecimento de métodos ágeis (Scrum/Kanban);
  • Prática com ferramentas de versionamento como o GIT.


Como é a Cultura Super?

Temos uma cultura de muita confiança, focada em resultados, sem micro gerenciamento, muita autonomia e transparência. Muitos desafios e aprendizados, buscamos excelência em tudo o que fazemos, por isso estamos sempre aprendendo.


O que oferecemos:

  • Modelo de contratação: PJ;
  • ‍ Modelo de trabalho 100% remoto: uma oportunidade de crescimento acessível para talentos em todo o Brasil;
  • ⚕Plano de Saúde: mantenha-se saudável com nosso abrangente plano de saúde nacional com consultas online e presenciais;
  • ‍♀️Wellhub/GymPass: bem-estar completo para você cuidar da sua saúde física e mental com os aplicativos integrados;
  • Voucher Kit Escritório: receba um voucher para turbinar o seu espaço de trabalho e garantir seu conforto, comodidade e produtividade;
  • Férias remuneradas: desfrute de 30 dias de férias remuneradas por ano para recarregar suas energias e relaxar;
  • Programa Super-Get-Super: indique um talento e receba um bônus;

description:
Olá, somos a SuperFrete :)


Estamos construindo a maior e mais amada rede de logística digital, quer fazer parte disso?

Somos uma startup que atua no segmento do varejo e logística, apoiando os pequenos e médios empreendedores a se tornarem mais competitivos no mercado e a alavancarem suas vendas.

Por isso, buscamos um Super Desenvolvedor(a) Backend Node Senior , dinâmico e experiente, que se identifique com o nosso propósito, que tenha muita energia para somar no time de Tecnologia e que queira crescer (muito!) com a gente.


Responsabilidades:

  • Irá ajudar a criar e implementar soluções para manter o sistema sempre prático e escalável;
  • Fazer code reviews com atenção e cuidado;
  • Desenvolver, manter e otimizar aplicações backend usando Node.js, TypeScript e JavaScript;
  • Colaborar com a equipe de desenvolvimento para projetar e implementar soluções escaláveis e de alto desempenho;
  • Integrar sistemas com serviços de nuvem (ex: Firebase, AWS) para garantir escalabilidade e confiabilidade;
  • Desenvolver e manter bancos de dados MongoDB, garantindo eficiência e segurança;
  • Apoiar iniciativas de DevOps, automatizando processos e implantando pipelines de CI/CD;
  • Colaborar com outros membros da equipe para garantir a consistência e a qualidade do código;
  • Responder prontamente às necessidades da equipe e do projeto, resolvendo problemas com princípios de programação sólidos.


Requisitos:

  • Sólida experiência em desenvolvimento backend com Node.js;
  • Conhecimento de TypeScript e JavaScript.
  • Experiência em integração com serviços de nuvem (Firebase, AWS, etc.).
  • Familiaridade com bancos de dados relacionais e não relacionais, como Postgres e Mongodb;
  • Saiba escrever testes;
  • Experiência em práticas de DevOps;
  • Compreensão profunda de arquitetura de software orientada a serviços e boas práticas de desenvolvimento;
  • Alguma experiência com desenho, construção e otimização de arquitetura serverless;
  • Experiência com Clean Code e/ou Clean Architecture;
  • Capacidade de trabalhar com problemas novos e difíceis e de contribuir para bibliotecas conforme necessário.


Será legal se você tiver:

  • Experiência com CI/CD com pipelines;
  • Conhecimento de métodos ágeis (Scrum/Kanban);
  • Prática com ferramentas de versionamento como o GIT.


Como é a Cultura Super?

Temos uma cultura de muita confiança, focada em resultados, sem micro gerenciamento, muita autonomia e transparência. Muitos desafios e aprendizados, buscamos excelência em tudo o que fazemos, por isso estamos sempre aprendendo.


O que oferecemos:

  • Modelo de contratação: PJ;
  • ‍ Modelo de trabalho 100% remoto: uma oportunidade de crescimento acessível para talentos em todo o Brasil;
  • ⚕Plano de Saúde: mantenha-se saudável com nosso abrangente plano de saúde nacional com consultas online e presenciais;
  • ‍♀️Wellhub/GymPass: bem-estar completo para você cuidar da sua saúde física e mental com os aplicativos integrados;
  • Voucher Kit Escritório: receba um voucher para turbinar o seu espaço de trabalho e garantir seu conforto, comodidade e produtividade;
  • Férias remuneradas: desfrute de 30 dias de férias remuneradas por ano para recarregar suas energias e relaxar;
  • Programa Super-Get-Super: indique um talento e receba um bônus;

title: Quality Assurance Analyst - Remote
description:
Recognized as the leading software development company in the Americas, our client offers 100% remote modality and an excellent work environment where employees can thrive, and work in multicultural teams, with flexible schedules and endless growth opportunities.


About the Role:


We are looking for a Quality Assurance Analyst to join our Analyst team and participate in different projects made up of multicultural teams distributed throughout the world. We are looking for proactive people, team players passionate about programming in this language, and oriented to provide the best experience to the end-user. This is an excellent opportunity for those professionals looking to develop in one of the fastest-growing companies in the industry!


These developers will face numerous technical challenges, so they must use current technologies, and get involved in the mobile world, web applications, devices, etc.


Main Activities:


- Analyze end-user requirements to define and document test plans.

- Execute test cases, debug, detect errors and/or possible improvements, document them, and follow up to be resolved.

- Generate reports of test results and errors detected.

- Define priorities and plan tests of system requirements.

- Document the functionalities of the systems.

- Represent the end-user to the developers to ensure that the requirements are met.

- Detect and propose improvements in both the quality control process and the software development cycle.


Requirements:


- 5+ years of experience in testing Web Products.

- Solid knowledge of testing tools.

- Development of test plans: the creation of test cases and debugging.

- Additional knowledge in Web technologies.

- Extensive knowledge of Unix and Linux environments.

- Advanced English level.


Benefits:


- 100% remote work.

- Flexible hours - make your own schedule!

- Diverse and multicultural work environment.

- Paid parental leave, vacation & holidays.

- Hardware setup for you to work from home.

- Excellent compensation — well above the market average.

- Extensive opportunities for growth and professional development thanks to our mentoring system.


Enjoy the opportunity to have a dynamic lifestyle, better health, and wellness. Find renewed passion in your job, improve your productivity, and benefit from attractive growth opportunities for your career.


If you are interested in being part of a team composed of the best professionals and working 100% goal-oriented in an innovative environment, but with the structure and resources of a multinational market leader, do not hesitate to apply!

title: Consultor(a) SAP SD S/4 | OTC
description:
Estamos em busca de uma pessoa Consultora SAP SD S/4 OTC altamente qualificado para integrar nosso time e atuar em projetos estratégicos de transformação digital. Essa pessoa será responsável por liderar soluções relacionadas ao módulo SD (Sales and Distribution) com foco em processos Order-to-Cash (OtC) , trazendo expertise técnica e funcional para atender às necessidades do negócio!


Atividades:

  • Propor soluções inovadoras e práticas para os processos Order-to-Cash (OtC) , com foco em ARM (devoluções e reclamações de clientes) e gestão de Nota Fiscal , baseando-se em melhores práticas de mercado e implementações anteriores;
  • Liderar e garantir a integração entre diferentes workstreams , organizando alinhamentos e impulsionando temas críticos para o sucesso do projeto;
  • Atuar como consultor proativo, trazendo expertise e recomendações para atender às necessidades do negócio, sem depender exclusivamente de orientações do time de negócios;
  • Participar de workshops e reuniões com stakeholders, facilitando discussões, alinhando expectativas e garantindo a clareza dos requisitos e entregáveis;
  • Garantir a documentação técnica e funcional das soluções implementadas, mantendo a conformidade com padrões e boas práticas.


Requisitos:

  • Inglês avançado para conversação;
  • Conhecimento avançado em SAP SD , com foco em processos do módulo Order-to-Cash (OtC) no SAP S/4HANA;
  • Entendimento profundo e experiência em ARM (Advanced Returns Management) , incluindo devoluções e reclamações de clientes;
  • Sólido conhecimento em processos de Nota Fiscal , com foco na legislação brasileira e integração com sistemas fiscais;
  • Experiência prática em projetos de implementação e/ou migração no SAP S/4HANA , demonstrando capacidade de propor soluções baseadas em cenários reais;
  • Habilidade de trabalhar de forma consultiva, propondo melhorias e soluções com base em melhores práticas adotadas em outras empresas.


Informações adicionais:

  • Contratação PJ
  • Atuação remota
  • Disponibilidade para possível viagem pontual durante projeto
  • Previsão de projeto: 8 meses

  • Entendimento profundo e experiência em ARM (Advanced Returns Management) , incluindo devoluções e reclamações de clientes;
  • Sólido conhecimento em processos de Nota Fiscal , com foco na legislação brasileira e integração com sistemas fiscais;
  • Experiência prática em projetos de implementação e/ou migração no SAP S/4HANA , demonstrando capacidade de propor soluções baseadas em cenários reais;
  • Habilidade de trabalhar de forma consultiva, propondo melhorias e soluções com base em melhores práticas adotadas em outras empresas.


Informações adicionais:

  • Contratação PJ
  • Atuação remota
  • Disponibilidade para possível viagem pontual durante projeto
  • Previsão de projeto: 8 meses

title: Python Tech Lead - Remote
description:
Recognized as the leading software development company in the Americas, our client offers 100% remote modality and an excellent work environment in which employees can thrive, work in multicultural teams, with flexible schedules and endless growth opportunities.


About the Role:

We are looking for Python Tech Leads to join our Development team and participate in different projects made up of multicultural teams distributed throughout the world. We are looking for proactive people, team players passionate about programming in this language and oriented to provide the best experience to the end user. This is an excellent opportunity for those professionals looking to develop in one of the fastest growing companies in the industry!


These developers will face numerous technical challenges, so they must use current technologies, get involved in the mobile world, web applications, devices, etc.


Main Activities:

- Work closely alongside their Engineering and Business Stakeholders to support the delivery of the project.

- Be able to manage your time effectively to focus on coding as well as supporting junior members.

- Integrate with the DevOps team to maintain tasks.

- Make architectural decisions keeping the future of a growing business in mind.


Requirements:

- Solid practical experience in Python and Django development.

- Experience in development with object-oriented programming is desirable.

- Previous experience in development using other programming languages.

- Good skills with XML and relational databases (Oracle / MS SQL / MySQL).

- Experience with OOD.

- Strong professional experience working with large data structures (including XML) and algorithms.

- A University Degree in systems is a plus.

- Advanced English level.


Benefits:

- 100% remote work.

- Flexible hours - make your own schedule!

- Diverse and multicultural work environment.

- Paid parental leave, vacation & holidays.

- Hardware setup for you to work from home. 

- Excellent compensation — well above the market average.

- Extensive opportunities for growth and professional development thanks to our mentoring system.


Enjoy the opportunity to have a dynamic lifestyle, better health, and wellness. Find renewed passion in your job, improve your productivity, and benefit from attractive growth opportunities for your career.


If you are interested in being part of a team composed of the best professionals and working 100% goal-oriented in an innovative environment, but with the structure and resources of a multinational market leader, do not hesitate to apply!

title: SAP - Cutover Lead
description:
Come to one of the biggest IT Services companies in the world!! Here you can transform your career!


Why to join TCS? Here at TCS we believe that people make the difference, that's why we live a culture of unlimited learning full of opportunities for improvement and mutual development. The ideal scenario to expand ideas through the right tools, contributing to our success in a collaborative environment.


We are looking for SAP - Cutover Lead, who wants to learn and transform his career.


In this role you will:


  • We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Cutover Manager to lead and manage the overall cutover process for our SAP projects. The successful candidate will be responsible for planning, coordinating, and executing the cutover plan to ensure a seamless transition with minimal disruption to business operations.


And much better if you stand out for:


  • Proven experience in cutover planning and execution, ideally within the pharmaceutical or healthcare sector.


  • Strong leadership and stakeholder management capabilities with excellent communication skills.


  • Proficiency in Portuguese and English is must.


  • Proficiency in project management tools (e.g., MS Project, JIRA, or similar platforms).


  • Analytical mindset with a focus on risk management and change control processes.



What do we offer?



TCS Benefits – Brazil:

  • Health insurance
  • Dental Plan
  • Life insurance
  • Transportation vouchers
  • Meal/Food Voucher
  • Childcare assistance
  • Gympass
  • TCS Cares – free 0800 that provides psychological assistance (24 hrs/day), legal, social and financial assistance to associates
  • Partnership with SESC
  • Reimbursement of Certifications
  • Free TCS Learning Portal – Online courses and live training
  • International experience opportunity
  • Discount Partnership with Universities and Language Schools
  • Bring Your Buddy – By referring people you become eligible to receive a bonus for each hire
  • TCS Gems – Recognition for performance
  • Xcelerate – Free Mentoring Career Platform


At TATA Consultancy Services we promote an inclusive culture, we always work for equity. This applies to Gender, People with Disabilities, LGBTQIA+, Religion, Race, Ethnicity. All our opportunities are based on these principles. We think of different actions of inclusion and social responsibility, in order to build a TCS that respects individuality. Come to be a TCSer!


#Buildingonbelief

title: Desenvolvedor full stack
description:
Vaga Sênior 100% Inglês


Quem Somos

A Dexian, lançada em 2023, tem presença global e traz consigo quase 30 anos de experiência através de suas companhias legadas, principalmente da combinação da DISYS e Signature Consultants.


Iniciamos no Brasil 2007 como DISYS e, de lá para cá, conquistamos mais de 60 clientes de diferentes setores da economia. Como Dexian, passamos a ser uma das maiores empresas de soluções de staffing, soluções de TI e complementação de força de trabalho. Estamos liderando a indústria por meio de entrega de serviços exclusivos que combina escala global, projetos de serviço completo e agilidade tática para modernizar modelos de contratação. Apoiamos nossos clientes para encontrar a melhor maneira que seu gap de talentos seja endereçado, de maneira a suportar seu processo de transformação digital. Contamos com escritórios estrategicamente localizados em quatro grandes capitais: Curitiba (PR), Porto Alegre (RS), Rio de Janeiro (RJ) e São Paulo (SP). Assim, conseguimos nos manter próximos dos nossos clientes e consultores. Também somos uma Minority Owner Company e nos sentimos orgulhosos de termos nascido na diversidade.


O que esperar de nós

Pessoas estão no centro de nossa estratégia e compõem o nosso maior capital. Temos compromisso de atrair, reter os melhores talentos e construir conexões reais para a vida. Por isso, atuamos como ponte entre profissionais altamente qualificados e oportunidades consistentes e prósperas. Acreditamos que, trazer o talento, a tecnologia e as organizações certas juntos, ajuda a desbloquear resultados transformadores e alcançar novos níveis de sucessos para os clientes que atendemos e os consultores que contratamos. E para isso, cinco valores fundamentais nos guiam: Integridade, Transparência, Autenticidade, Engenhosidade e Empatia. A Dexian está comprometida com a responsabilidade social corporativa e, investe em programas que apoiam a diversidade e inclusão.


Se você compartilha dos mesmos valores, aqui é seu lugar!


O que esperar do seu dia a dia de trabalho

  • Desenvolver e manter aplicações web utilizando Python, JavaScript, Node.js, Vue.js e Nuxt.js
  • Projetar e implementar arquiteturas de software escaláveis
  • Atuar em ambientes de nuvem AWS e Google Cloud
  • Integrar ferramentas de busca textual como TypeSense ou Algolia (ou adaptar uma função de busca existente)
  • Implementar SSO (Single Sign-On) e integrações com plataformas
  • Participar de todas as fases do ciclo de vida do desenvolvimento: planejamento, desenvolvimento, testes, QA, release e suporte
  • Contribuir para o desenvolvimento tanto do frontend quanto do backend
  • Compreender e atender às necessidades de segurança em projetos web
  • Manter documentação técnica e de processos de alta qualidade
  • Otimizar e manter o código e os repositórios; identificar e corrigir bugs
  • Colaborar com equipes multidisciplinares, demonstrando fortes habilidades de comunicação e resolução de problemas
  • Oferecer um atendimento ao cliente de excelência


O que você precisa ter

  • Inglês avançado para conversação
  • Vue.js
  • Nuxt.js ou Next.js
  • Salesforce
  • AWS


Onde você vai trabalhar

No conforto da sua casa, regime 100% remoto!

title: MS Dynamics ERP Finance Consultant
description:
HCLTech is a global technology company, home to 227,000+ people across 60 countries, delivering industry-leading capabilities centered around digital, engineering and cloud, powered by a broad portfolio of technology services and products. We work with clients across all major verticals, providing industry solutions for Financial Services, Manufacturing, Life Sciences and Healthcare, Technology and Services, Telecom and Media, Retail and CPG, and Public Services. Consolidated revenues as of 12 months ending September 2022 totaled $12.1 billion.

To learn how we can supercharge progress for you, visit


Job Description:

  • Implement and configure ERP financial modules.
  • Analyze business requirements and translate them into ERP solutions.
  • Provide training and support to end-users.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure system integration.
  • Monitor and troubleshoot ERP system performance.
  • Develop and maintain documentation for ERP processes.
  • Bilingual – English/Portuguese


Why choose us?

We are one of the fastest growing technology companies in the world, with more than 60 offices around the world and a global team of 227,000 employees.

Our company is extremely diverse, with 165 nationalities represented.

We offer the opportunity to work with colleagues around the world.

We offer a flexible and remote work environment, prioritizing the integration between work and personal life.

We are committed to your growth, offering learning and career development opportunities at all levels.

We offer comprehensive benefits for all employees.

Certified as "Great Place to Work" and "Top Employer" in 25 countries, recognized as "Top Employer" in Brazil, providing a positive work environment that values employee recognition and respect.


Equality & Opportunity for All

Representing 165 nationalities across the globe, we pride ourselves on being an equal opportunity employer, committed to providing equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees regardless of race, religion, sex, color, age, national origin, pregnancy, sexual orientation, physical disability or genetic information, military or veteran status, or any other protected classification, in accordance with federal, state, and/or local law.

title: Junior .NET Developer - Remote
description:
At INDI, we're passionate about empowering individuals and businesses worldwide. Our cutting-edge recruiters connect leading companies with top talent, fostering a dynamic environment where innovation thrives. Join us in shaping the future of work.


Overview of the Role:

We seek a proficient Junior .NET Developer capable of maintaining high standards of technical quality and innovation, dedicated to continuous improvement, and committed to assisting clients worldwide.

Success in this role requires detailed knowledge of development techniques, excellent communication, and organizational skills


As a member of the team, you will:

  • Architect and develop various services and APIs
  • Apply SOLID principles to craft maintainable and high-quality code
  • Collaborate with product owners to ensure features/changes align with business requirements and degreed strategy
  • Engage closely with designers, UX, and other developers to grasp new features, dependencies, and technical intricacies
  • Fulfill other assigned duties


Key qualifications and skills for success in this role include:

  • Advanced proficiency in English (spoken and written)
  • Proficiency in SQL and NoSQL Databases
  • Experience with Microservices and the Cloud
  • Knowledge of algorithms
  • Understanding of IT infrastructure
  • Proficiency in managing Agile methodologies
  • Familiarity with best practices, SOLID principles, CLEAN Code, and scalable solutions
  • Understanding of Design Patterns
  • Experience in developing entire applications from scratch
  • Proficiency in automated tests, CI/CD pipelines
  • Experience with version control
  • Strong skills in unit testing, integration testing, and code coverage


Benefits:

  • Flexibility: Choose where and how you work for enhanced creativity and innovation.
  • Tailored Compensation: Personalize your earnings to suit your financial goals.
  • Tech-Driven Tools: Access cutting-edge resources for seamless collaboration and productivity.
  • Autonomous Workflow: Take control of your schedule to achieve work-life balance.
  • Well-being: Enjoy generous leave policies for rest and rejuvenation.
  • Diversity & Inclusion: Thrive in a diverse and inclusive environment.
  • Collaboration: Engage with industry leaders for collective growth.
  • Development: Access mentorship and growth opportunities for continuous advancement.


If you are interested in being part of a team composed of the best professionals and working 100% goal-oriented in an innovative environment, but with the structure and resources of a multinational market leader, do not hesitate to apply!

title: Senior Full‑Stack Software Engineer (NodeJS/TypeScript/AI)
description:
Contact:  

Website:  


About House Numbers


The U.S. mortgage industry originated 4.3 million loans in 2023, with $25 billion in origination labor costs. House Numbers is transforming inefficient, outdated processes in a slow-moving sector with an AI-powered mortgage loan processing service that delivers 50%+ cost savings, faster response times, and a shorter time to close, without requiring brokers or lenders to change their existing systems. Starting with independent brokers, our pay-per-loan pricing model allows us to scale profitably while still deeply undercutting the standard third party processing fees. We are backed by leading Silicon Valley venture‑capital funds and angel investors, including Resolute Ventures, Maven Ventures, and Uncommon Capital.



About the role


As a Senior Full‑Stack Engineer on a small team, you’ll join a fast‑moving group where every engineer owns meaningful product surface area. Demand for our AI‑assisted processing platform is accelerating, and we’re expanding the engineering team to build new customer‑facing features and keep our infrastructure resilient as we scale.

We’re looking for someone who is excited about owning the entire development of product flows and features across our codebase. You’ll help decide the patterns and practices adopted company‑wide and touch every part of the development process—shipping production‑ready code daily, actively shaping the product roadmap, spotting and addressing process improvements, coding with TDD/BDD, following agile methodologies based on the team needs, and driving the changes needed to keep us moving quickly and safely.



Our tech stack includes

  • Frontend : Remix, React, Typescript, and Tailwind
  • Backend : Node / Express, Mongo, Docker, Kubernetes clusters (EKS), CI/CD on CircleCI, infrastructure on AWS using ECR and ECS, LLMs on OpenAI and Orq.


Bonus points

  • Containerization & orchestration knowledge (Docker, Kubernetes, Helm)
  • Observability skills (OpenTelemetry, Prometheus, Grafana)
  • Familiarity with infrastructure‑as‑code (Terraform)
  • Experience in mortgage‑tech / fintech or other regulated domains
  • A master of using AI-enabled tools to increase your productivity as an engineer (Cursor, obviously, and more!), while maintaining code quality



Responsibilities of the role


  • Partner with Product, Operations and Design to drive roadmap and execution.
  • Develop and iterate quickly based on user feedback, quantitative metrics, experience and intuition.
  • Push the limits of LLM and ML capabilities (including agentic AI) to automate loan processing workflows, enabling us to deliver a better quality service more and more efficiently over time.
  • Evolve our technology and architecture for the challenges ahead.
  • Maintain and support high-quality and reliable services.
  • Continuously deliver small, high-quality changes to production.



What we’re looking for


  • Significant, relevant experience with Node/JavaScript/TypeScript. We won’t set an arbitrary number of required years of experience here, but you must be a senior developer comfortable across all software development lanes and have broad problem solving skills.
  • Significant, hands‑on experience embedding LLMs into production apps (prompt design, evals and version control, retrieval‑augmented generation, vector stores, etc.) or deploying ML models/services.
  • Someone who is highly productive and has contributed a significant amount of code to a new project -- either at a startup or within a larger organization -- in a collaborative, cross-disciplinary environment.
  • Promote testing as a natural part of your coding efforts.
  • Experience solving distributed architectural challenges.
  • You should be excited to have a lot of impact and responsibility. We do not sign off and forget about work for the entire weekend when something important needs to be done. :)
  • Someone approachable and friendly, who has strong communication skills. Though we are a multi-lingual team — Spanish, English, Portuguese, and more — full English fluency and comfort is required. We love over-communication and prioritize collaboration, pair programming and code review.
  • A positive, relaxed and curious approach to solving problems. A true team-player with no ego.
  • Someone willing to give 100% (or more!) of their professional efforts to the company, i.e., no moonlighting allowed, please.



Join us as we innovate and create cutting-edge solutions that drive success!


﻿Job Type: Full-time


Pay: $60,000.00 - $120,000.00 per year


Compensation Package:

  • Bonus opportunities
  • Yearly pay

Work Location: Remote

title: Consultor SAP Basis Pleno
description:
Sobre nós

A Atos é uma líder global em transformação digital, com cerca de 94.000 colaboradores e uma receita anual de aproximadamente €11 bilhões de euros. Número um na Europa em cibersegurança, nuvem e computação de alto desempenho, o Grupo oferece soluções personalizadas de ponta a ponta para todos os setores em 69 países. Pioneira em serviços e produtos de descarbonização, a Atos está comprometida com um ambiente digital seguro e descarbonizado para seus clientes. A Atos é uma SE (Societas Europaea) e está listada na Euronext Paris.



Buscamos um Consultor SAP Basis Pleno para atuação em cliente Atos.

Horário comercial

Perfil Pleno

Atuação Remota


O que você vai fazer:

Descrição:

  • Profissional que efetuará atividades de infraestrutura BASIS no ambiente SAP.
  • Experiência sólida em SAP BASIS , com atuação em implantação e sustentação de sistemas SAP.

title: Head of Marketing (Performance)
description:
We’re revolutionizing the online betting landscape across Latin America and beyond. As a fast-growing, data-driven company, we combine cutting-edge technology with a passion for innovation. Operating in Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Peru, Mexico, and Canada — with aggressive expansion plans ahead — we are setting a new standard in online gaming.

We’re looking for bold, ambitious leaders ready to create lasting impact in a high-growth, entrepreneurial environment.


What You'll Be Doing

As Head of Performance Marketing , you will own and lead our acquisition engine. This is a high-impact leadership role with direct exposure to the executive team. You will be responsible for building a highly sophisticated performance marketing strategy powered by data, automation, and AI — tailored for the nuances of regulated and emerging markets.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Define and execute a performance marketing roadmap across multiple channels and countries, optimizing for ROI, LTV, and CPA.
  • Lead digital acquisition strategy across Google Ads, Meta, TikTok, WhatsApp, and new-gen platforms like Twitch and Kick.com.
  • Own the paid media P&L, aligning investment with business growth objectives.
  • Apply AI/ML tools for real-time optimization, personalized targeting, and creative automation.
  • Build advanced tracking and attribution models using tools like GA4, Segment, GTM, Adjust, or AppsFlyer.
  • Integrate acquisition strategy with CRM, content, and product teams to optimize the entire customer journey from awareness to retention.
  • Stay ahead of regulatory and compliance requirements in online betting markets, adapting campaigns accordingly.
  • Lead and scale a regional performance marketing team, fostering a high-performance, data-first culture.
  • Collaborate closely with Data Science and Engineering teams to ensure measurement accuracy and campaign impact.
  • Identify and test new channels, ad formats, tools, and trends to stay on the cutting edge of digital acquisition.


What We’re Looking For

  • 10+ years of experience in digital performance marketing, including at least 5 years in online betting, gaming, fintech, or other regulated industries.
  • Proven track record of managing multi-million dollar ad budgets with strong results in ROAS, CAC, LTV, and retention.
  • Expertise in paid media platforms: Google Ads, Meta Advantage+, TikTok Ads, X Ads, and WhatsApp Business.
  • Hands-on experience with MMPs (Adjust, AppsFlyer), tracking systems (GA4, GTM, Segment), and fraud prevention tools.
  • Strong knowledge of CRM strategy and integrating acquisition with lifecycle marketing.
  • Fluency in interpreting performance metrics and cohort data to drive real-time decision making.
  • Demonstrated ability to lead cross-functional teams and manage performance marketing at scale across multiple regions.
  • Deep understanding of LATAM consumer behavior, marketing regulations, and platform trends.
  • Fluent in Spanish and English. Portuguese is a strong plus.


What You’ll Gain

  • Opportunity to lead a mission-critical growth function in one of the fastest-growing online betting platforms in LATAM.
  • Direct influence over company growth, marketing innovation, and market expansion.
  • A collaborative, tech-savvy, and entrepreneurial work culture.
  • Competitive compensation + performance-based bonuses.
  • Autonomy, ownership, and room to innovate.

What We’re Looking For

  • 10+ years of experience in digital performance marketing, including at least 5 years in online betting, gaming, fintech, or other regulated industries.
  • Proven track record of managing multi-million dollar ad budgets with strong results in ROAS, CAC, LTV, and retention.
  • Expertise in paid media platforms: Google Ads, Meta Advantage+, TikTok Ads, X Ads, and WhatsApp Business.
  • Hands-on experience with MMPs (Adjust, AppsFlyer), tracking systems (GA4, GTM, Segment), and fraud prevention tools.
  • Strong knowledge of CRM strategy and integrating acquisition with lifecycle marketing.
  • Fluency in interpreting performance metrics and cohort data to drive real-time decision making.
  • Demonstrated ability to lead cross-functional teams and manage performance marketing at scale across multiple regions.
  • Deep understanding of LATAM consumer behavior, marketing regulations, and platform trends.
  • Fluent in Spanish and English. Portuguese is a strong plus.


What You’ll Gain

  • Opportunity to lead a mission-critical growth function in one of the fastest-growing online betting platforms in LATAM.
  • Direct influence over company growth, marketing innovation, and market expansion.
  • A collaborative, tech-savvy, and entrepreneurial work culture.
  • Competitive compensation + performance-based bonuses.
  • Autonomy, ownership, and room to innovate.

title: Supply Chain Analyst - Remote
description:
Recognized as the leading software development company in the Americas, our client offers 100% remote modality and an excellent work environment where employees can thrive, and work in multicultural teams, with flexible schedules and endless growth opportunities.


About the Role:


We are looking for a Supply Chain Analyst to join our team and help drive our growth. As a Supply Chain Analyst, you will play a critical and active role in the day-to-day operations. This is an excellent opportunity to be one of the key members of our team and position yourself for unique career growth opportunities.

What You’ll Do:


- Determine supply needs for products and services and research potential suppliers.

- Act as a link and communicate pricing and performance needs to vendors and suppliers.

- Participate in negotiations of favorable procurement contracts and prices with selected vendors and suppliers.

- Select the most suitable suppliers in terms of reliability, product quality, and cost-efficiency.

- Maintain and update a list of suppliers and their qualifications, delivery times, and potential future development.

- Prepare cost-benefit analysis reports for review by managers.




Here’s what we are looking for:


- 2+ years experience in a supply management role or related position.

- Knowledge of SAP or SAP B1.

- Degree in supply chain management, logistics, business management, or related fields.

- Experience in managing inventory.

- SQL analysis tools and mathematical analysis.

- Interpersonal skills and ability to build and improve trust.

- Advanced English level.


Benefits:


- 100% remote work.

- Flexible hours - make your own schedule!

- Diverse and multicultural work environment.

- Paid parental leave, vacation & holidays.

- Hardware setup for you to work from home.

- Excellent compensation — well above the market average.

- Extensive opportunities for growth and professional development thanks to our mentoring system.


Enjoy the opportunity to have a dynamic lifestyle, better health, and wellness. Find renewed passion in your job, improve your productivity, and benefit from attractive growth opportunities for your career.


If you are interested in being part of a team composed of the best professionals and working 100% goal-oriented in an innovative environment, but with the structure and resources of a multinational market leader, do not hesitate to apply!

title: Consultor SAP FI/CO
description:
Come to one of the biggest IT Services companies in the world!! Here you can transform your career!

Why to join TCS? Here at TCS we believe that people make the difference, that's why we live a culture of unlimited learning full of opportunities for improvement and mutual development. The ideal scenario to expand ideas through the right tools, contributing to our success in a collaborative environment.

We are looking for SAP FI CO Senior, who wants to learn and transform his career.


In this role you will:


  • SAP FICO projects experience


  • S4 Hana CFIN Implementation project experience preferred.


  • E2E implementations.


  • Advanced English.


And much better if you stand out for:


  • Configuration Knowledge of CFIN Source and Target Systems.


  • Data mapping knowledge with reference to CFIN.


  • Interface knowledge for data migration to CFIN from SAP/Non SAP systems using LTMC.


  • Knowledge of Initial Load, BADI, Coding blocks, Experience in custom extension fields.


  • Expertise in FI, CO & CO-PA, Tax etc.


  • Good knowledge of SAP-SLT.


  • Good knowledge of PAPM Module.



  • Good knowledge of MDG, Embedded Analytics.


  • Debugging knowledge



What do we offer?

  • TCS Benefits – Brazil:
  • Health insurance
  • Dental Plan
  • Life insurance
  • Transportation vouchers
  • Meal/Food Voucher
  • Childcare assistance
  • Gympass
  • TCS Cares – free 0800 that provides psychological assistance (24 hrs/day), legal, social and financial assistance to associates
  • Partnership with SESC
  • Reimbursement of Certifications
  • Free TCS Learning Portal – Online courses and live training
  • International experience opportunity
  • Discount Partnership with Universities and Language Schools
  • Bring Your Buddy – By referring people you become eligible to receive a bonus for each hire
  • TCS Gems – Recognition for performance
  • Xcelerate – Free Mentoring Career Platform


At TATA Consultancy Services we promote an inclusive culture, we always work for equity. This applies to Gender, People with Disabilities, LGBTQIA+, Religion, Race, Ethnicity. All our opportunities are based on these principles. We think of different actions of inclusion and social responsibility, in order to build a TCS that respects individuality. Come to be a TCSer!


#Buildingonbelief

title: Scrum Master Jr/Pl.
description:
Na Stefanini, acreditamos no poder da colaboração. Co-criamos soluções inovadoras em parceria com nossos clientes, combinando tecnologia de ponta, inteligência artificial e a criatividade humana. Estamos na vanguarda da resolução de problemas de negócios, proporcionando impacto real em escala global.

Ao se juntar à Stefanini, você se torna parte de uma jornada global de transformação. Estamos empenhados em criar impacto positivo não apenas nos negócios, mas também na vida de nossos colaboradores. Se você procura uma oportunidade de crescimento profissional em uma empresa que valoriza inovação, respeito, autonomia e parceria, você encontra aqui!


Junte-se a nós e seja parte da mudança!


Essencial:


  • Ensino superior cursando ou completo na área de TI ou correlatas;
  • Experiência prévia em ambientes ágeis;
  • Conhecimento em Scrum e metodologias ágeis;
  • Habilidades de comunicação e colaboração;
  • Capacidade de facilitar reuniões (Daily Stand-ups, Sprint Planning, Retrospectives);
  • Habilidade para resolver conflitos e promover um ambiente de trabalho colaborativo.


Desejável:


  • Certificação Scrum Master (CSM - Certified ScrumMaster, PSM I - Professional Scrum Master Level I, ou equivalente).


Vale Alimentação ou Vale Refeição;

‍ Desconto em cursos, universidades e instituições de idiomas;

Academia Stefanini - plataforma com cursos online, gratuitos, atualizados e com certificado;

Mentoring;

Clube de vantagens para consultas e exames;

Assistência Médica;

title: Project Manager
description:
Job Title: Project Manager

Location: Remote (EST Time zone)

Salary Range: up to 2500 USD

Work Schedule: Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM (EST)


NOTE: INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR POSITION


Company Overview:

Sagan is an exclusive membership community for top executives, founders, and CEOs seeking to hire and maximize the impact of international talent. We bridge the gap between global talent and US-based businesses, connecting candidates from vibrant regions like Latin America, the Philippines, India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, and Africa with leading American companies. Discover a world of career possibilities with Sagan.


Client Overview:

Sagan represents a leading signage company known for its innovative solutions and excellent customer service. We are currently seeking a skilled and dedicated Project Manager to support our high-level salesperson and ensure the successful execution of our projects.


Position Overview:

As a Project Operations Manager, you will play a crucial role in providing administrative support to our sales team. This role requires strong organizational skills, attention to detail, and effective communication abilities. You will assist in coordinating sales activities, managing client interactions, and ensuring smooth operations within the sales department.


Key Responsibilities:

- Manage and coordinate all phases of signage projects, ensuring on-time delivery within scope and budget.

-Collaborate with the sales team to understand client requirements and project specifications.

-Develop detailed project plans, timelines, and budgets.

-Communicate effectively with clients to provide updates and ensure satisfaction.

-Use project management tools like Corebridge, Monday, Slack, Trello, and Hubspot for task management and progress tracking.

-Coordinate with the production team to ensure accurate and timely delivery.

-Monitor project performance and identify areas for improvement.

-Prepare and present project reports to stakeholders.

-Maintain organized project documentation.


Requirements:

- Proven experience as a Project Manager in signage or related industry.

-Mid-level experience (3-5 years).High proficiency in English.

-Strong organizational and multitasking skills.

-Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.

-Proficiency in Google Suite, Corebridge, Monday, Slack, Trello, and Hubspot.


Preferred Qualifications:

-Experience with international teams and clients.

-Familiarity with signage production processes and materials.

-Background in sales support or customer service.

-Experience in construction or architecture.

We bridge the gap between global talent and US-based businesses, connecting candidates from vibrant regions like Latin America, the Philippines, India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, and Africa with leading American companies. Discover a world of career possibilities with Sagan.


Client Overview:

Sagan represents a leading signage company known for its innovative solutions and excellent customer service. We are currently seeking a skilled and dedicated Project Manager to support our high-level salesperson and ensure the successful execution of our projects.


Position Overview:

As a Project Operations Manager, you will play a crucial role in providing administrative support to our sales team. This role requires strong organizational skills, attention to detail, and effective communication abilities. You will assist in coordinating sales activities, managing client interactions, and ensuring smooth operations within the sales department.


Key Responsibilities:

- Manage and coordinate all phases of signage projects, ensuring on-time delivery within scope and budget.

-Collaborate with the sales team to understand client requirements and project specifications.

-Develop detailed project plans, timelines, and budgets.

-Communicate effectively with clients to provide updates and ensure satisfaction.

-Use project management tools like Corebridge, Monday, Slack, Trello, and Hubspot for task management and progress tracking.

-Coordinate with the production team to ensure accurate and timely delivery.

-Monitor project performance and identify areas for improvement.

-Prepare and present project reports to stakeholders.

-Maintain organized project documentation.


Requirements:

- Proven experience as a Project Manager in signage or related industry.

-Mid-level experience (3-5 years).High proficiency in English.

-Strong organizational and multitasking skills.

-Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.

-Proficiency in Google Suite, Corebridge, Monday, Slack, Trello, and Hubspot.


Preferred Qualifications:

-Experience with international teams and clients.

-Familiarity with signage production processes and materials.

-Background in sales support or customer service.

-Experience in construction or architecture.

title: Desenvolvedor Low-code
description:
Sobre a Empresa


Há mais de 20 anos mercado, somos uma consultoria estratégica de Inovação e Transformação Digital. Nossa especialidade é impulsionar as demandas de nossos clientes, integrando processos, pessoas e tecnologia de alta performance.


Sobre o Cargo

Você é apaixonado por tecnologia, agilidade e soluções práticas? Estamos em busca de um(a) Desenvolvedor(a) Low-code para integrar nosso time de tecnologia e ajudar a acelerar a transformação digital da nossa empresa!

Você vai atuar no desenvolvimento e manutenção de aplicações utilizando plataformas low-code, colaborando com times multifuncionais para entregar soluções rápidas, eficientes e com foco na experiência do usuário.


Responsabilidades


  • Desenvolver e manter aplicações utilizando plataformas low-code (ex: OutSystems, Mendix, Power Apps, Appian, etc.)
  • Responsável por codificar, testar, revisar e manter o software em alto nível.;
  • Colaborar com áreas de negócio para entender necessidades e propor soluções viáveis;
  • Atuar/ colaborar com designers, QAs e stakeholders, aplicando metodologias ágeis e propondo melhorias técnicas contínuas;
  • Garantir a integração com APIs, bancos de dados e sistemas legados
  • Documentar processos e boas práticas



Requisitos Obrigatórios:

  • Experiência prévia com alguma plataforma low-code
  • Conhecimento em lógica de programação e banco de dados
  • Capacidade de análise e levantamento de requisitos
  • Experiência com metodologias ágeis (Scrum, Kanban)


Desejáveis:


  • Power Platform (Power Apps / Power Automate) → JavaScript, TypeScript, Power Fx
  • OutSystems → SQL, JavaScript, C#
  • Mendix → Java, JavaScript
  • Appian → Java, JavaScript
  • Salesforce (com Flow Builder) → Apex, JavaScript


Atuação remota


CLT

Benefícios CLT:

Vale Refeição - Cartão flash

title: Senior IT Recruiter (BRAZIL)
description:
VTRAC Consulting Corporation

Intelligent Resources


Thank you for applying to VTRAC opportunities. Please e-mail your resume as an MS-WORD document in confidence Subject: Senior IT Recruiter, Attention: .


Position: Senior IT Recruiter (BRAZIL)

Working hours: Tuesday to Friday 9:30am to 6:30pm (Pacific time) , Saturdays 9:30am to 5pm (Pacific time).

Position Type: Permanent (Base Salary + Bonus + Paid Vacation)

Locations: 100% Remote (BRAZIL )


ABOUT VTRAC


VTRAC Consulting Corporation ( is a well-established Recruitment and Consulting firm with a strong track record of providing quality resources in Technology, Finance & Corporate Services, and DEI fields. VTRAC was founded in 1993 by senior technology and business professionals and support clients in Canada and the U.S. VTRAC is a majority women-owned company, a WeConnect and CAMSC certified diversity supplier, and a strong believer in Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion.


At VTRAC, our most important asset is our people. We are all about teamwork, growth, quality of delivery, and relationships. We are always open to the opportunity of working with great people. If you are a team player, quality-driven, and have exceptional experience in recruitment and candidate marketing skills we would be interested in speaking with you. VTRAC offers an environment where your ideas are very important, the opportunity to work in an energetic and supportive team where personal and professional growth matters and the associated rewards and competitive compensation are accelerated only by your own desire and commitment.


THE POSITION


As a Senior IT Recruiter, you will be working with the recruitment, business development professionals, and clients, and will primarily be responsible for applying your search, technical and functional evaluation, and negotiation selection skills to recruit quality technology, engineering, and business resources.


RESPONSIBILITIES


  • Identify, engage, and explore candidates’ real motivation and interest, validate their skills and competencies, and present quality talents in a timely manner.
  • In-depth technical and functional evaluation and assessment of technology candidates.
  • Participate in full-cycle recruitment and staffing assignments for both contract and permanent placement opportunities, for clients in the Technology, Finance, and Corporate sectors.
  • Create job descriptions and post jobs on various job sites and databases.
  • Network, research databases, contact, source, collect, screen applications, select, examine, evaluate, and interview candidates.
  • Prepare a qualified short list of prospective candidates.
  • Coordinate and notify candidates on requirements for the prospective position, job offers, contracts, terms, and conditions of employment.
  • Learn and utilize sourcing techniques such as Boolean-equation, job boards, and professional networking site mining.
  • Partner and collaborate with other recruiters through teamwork, imparting your knowledge, experience, skills, and advice on staffing policies and procedures.
  • Coordinate presentation of candidates to prospective clients.
  • Prepare reporting on activities and results.


QUALIFICATION


  • 5+ years in recruitment, including IT recruitment experience.
  • Minimum 3 years of experience in DIRECT HEADHUNTING of permanent and contract technology candidates.
  • Minimum 4 years of experience in recruitment agencies with full cycle, direct recruiting calls to candidates all the way to present to the client.Must have in-depth technical evaluation experience. You should be able to fully assess the candidate’s technical skills.
  • VERY STRONG networking and relationship-building skills.
  • Fluent English communication skills (verbal and written).
  • STRONG teamwork, time management, and organizational skills.
  • 2+ years of sales support or marketing experience
  • 2+ years of social media engagement, especially on LinkedIn.
  • IT Knowledge
  • VERY familiar with MS Word and LinkedIn Recruiter.
  • Working experience with MS Word, CRM, or ATS systems.
  • 1+ years working with U.S. or Canadian markets.
  • 1+ years of sales experience with strong client relationship skills.


We thank all candidates in advance. Only selected candidates for interviews will be contacted. For other exciting opportunities, please visit us at VTRAC is an equal-opportunity employer.


Toronto . New York . Houston . Palo Alto

title: Programa de Estágio da IUNEX
description:
Estudantes universitários da área de Tecnologia da Informação, esta é a sua chance de mergulhar no mundo corporativo com o Programa de Estágio da IUNEX! Se você tem sede de aprendizado, é movido por desafios e deseja fazer parte de um ambiente que celebra a diversidade, a inclusão e a inovação, nós queremos conhecer você.


Na IUNEX, não só valorizamos a sua educação e desenvolvimento contínuo, mas também proporcionamos um palco para que você brilhe. Com duração de 12 meses, prorrogáveis por mais 12, nosso programa é desenhado para equipá-lo(a) com conhecimentos práticos em projetos de tecnologia da informação em grandes empresas do mercado. Operando em uma jornada semanal de 30 horas, com flexibilidade de horários, você terá a oportunidade única de aplicar seus conhecimentos acadêmicos em projetos reais, sob a orientação de mentores experientes.


Além da experiência prática, o Programa de Estágio da IUNEX oferece treinamentos em habilidades técnicas e interpessoais, preparando você para o futuro profissional em todas as frentes. Aqueles que se destacarem têm a possibilidade de serem efetivados, abrindo portas para uma carreira promissora dentro da empresa.


O que oferecemos:

  • Bolsa auxílio competitiva de R$1.200,00
  • Realizar o estágio remotamente
  • Auxílio Home Office
  • Vale-refeição
  • Seguro de vida
  • Programa amplo de capacitação
  • Auxílio em certificações


Estamos à procura de talentos que:

  • Residam em qualquer região do Brasil
  • Estejam cursando Tecnologia da Informação, a partir do 1º período
  • Tenham disponibilidade para uma jornada de 6 horas diárias
  • Sejam curiosos e apaixonados por tecnologia

title: Node Developer - Remote
description:
At INDI, we're passionate about empowering individuals and businesses worldwide. Our cutting-edge recruiters connect leading companies with top talent, fostering a dynamic environment where innovation thrives. Join us in shaping the future of work.


Overview of the Role:


Are you ready to join a dynamic Development team and take on diverse projects with multicultural teams worldwide? We're seeking Node Developers who are proactive, collaborative team players passionate about programming and dedicated to delivering exceptional user experiences. This is an exciting opportunity to grow with one of the fastest-growing companies in the industry!


Responsibilities:


Q: What will you do as a Node Developer?

A: You'll architect Bandit backend systems using the best practices available. You'll implement and iterate on features swiftly and strategically, adapting to the demands of our fast-paced startup environment.


Q: How will you contribute to API design and implementation?

A: You'll play a crucial role in designing, extending, and implementing APIs to ensure robust functionality and seamless integration across platforms.


Q: How do you maintain engineering quality?

A: You'll uphold high standards through rigorous code reviews, comprehensive unit testing, and insightful analytics to drive continuous improvement.


Q: What role does automation play in your work?

A: Automating processes and developing tools will be key to enhancing engineering efficiency and productivity.


Q: How will you influence engineering processes?

A: You'll define and refine engineering processes to support successful product launches and releases, ensuring our solutions meet the highest standards.


Q: How can you help us expand our engineering team?

A: Conducting technical interviews will allow you to contribute to the growth of our world-class engineering team, bringing in top talent to drive our success.


Requirements:


Q: How much experience is required?

A: You should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in Node development, demonstrating your expertise and proficiency in the field.


Q: What specific expertise is needed in addition to Node development?

A: Experience in Video and HLS (HTTP Live Streaming) will be essential for addressing the diverse technical challenges you'll encounter.


Q: What language skills are necessary?

A: Proficiency in advanced English is required to effectively communicate and collaborate with our global teams and clients.


Benefits:

• Flexibility: Choose where and how you work for enhanced creativity and innovation.

• Tailored Compensation: Personalize your earnings to suit your financial goals.

• Tech-Driven Tools: Access cutting-edge resources for seamless collaboration and productivity.

• Autonomous Workflow: Take control of your schedule to achieve work-life balance.

• Well-being: Enjoy generous leave policies for rest and rejuvenation.

• Diversity & Inclusion: Thrive in a diverse and inclusive environment.

• Collaboration: Engage with industry leaders for collective growth.

• Development: Access mentorship and growth opportunities for continuous advancement.


If you are interested in being part of a team composed of the best professionals and working 100% goal-oriented in an innovative environment, but with the structure and resources of a multinational market leader, do not hesitate to apply!
